% command to add a header page
\newcommand{\headerpage}[2]{
	\newpage
	\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay, shift={(current page.south west)}]
		\fill[themecolor] (0, 9.5in) rectangle ++ (8.5in, 1.5in); % header line 1
		\fill[black!5] (0, 8.5in) rectangle ++ (8.5in, 1in); % header line 2
		\draw (1.5in, 9.875in) node[anchor = west] {\hspace{-5pt} {\Huge \color{white} \textbf{#1}}}; % heading
		\draw (1.5in, 8.975in) node[anchor = west] {\hspace{-5pt} {\normalsize \color{black!40} #2}}; % heading
	\end{tikzpicture}
	\phantomsection
	\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{#1}
	\vspace{1in}
}

% command to layout page
\newcommand\pagelayout{
	\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay, shift={(current page.south west)}]
		\fill[themecolor] (0, 10.75in) rectangle ++ (8.5in, 0.25in); % header
		\fill[black!5] (0, 0) rectangle ++ (8.5in, 0.5in); % footer
		\draw (0.25in,0.25in) node[anchor = west] {{\small \color{black!40} FOOTER}}; % footer content
		\draw (8.25in,0.25in) node[anchor = east] {{\small \color{black!40} \thepage}}; % page number
	\end{tikzpicture}
}

% add page layout 
\AtBeginShipout{
	\AtBeginShipoutUpperLeft{\pagelayout}
}
